**Which plugin to improve? Be explicit about the scope of the issue.**
e.g. "EasyConfig", "MySQLClient: ISQLQueryResult"

**Is it existing feature?**
e.g. "Method XYZ is abstract, while it should be virtual"

**Is it a new feature proposal?**
e.g. "Support AND group with OR in QueryBuilder"

**Additional context (optional)**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
